text:
Working on my life design product for the next 6 weeks - it is conceptually done, building wireframes now.

Any thoughts on the idea, title, description, etc?

cc @_buildspace @_nightsweekends season 5 https://t.co/GGoxah9dO5

user_info.name: Mattheus von Guttenberg
user_info.description: Many faces, one actor. A self-building self-builder. I am the room I seek to clean. Following my nose, I discover endless rabbit holes.
